title: build: include 'rm src/pkg/runtime/z*' change in go1.0.2
body:
Direct report from golang-nuts:

  https://groups.google.com/d/topic/golang-nuts/nEhKlZSvs7w/discussion

When I compile with and without GOARM=5 set, I get:
# Building C bootstrap tool.
cmd/dist

# Building compilers and Go bootstrap tool for host, linux/arm.
lib9
libbio
libmach
misc/pprof
cmd/addr2line
cmd/cov
cmd/nm
cmd/objdump
cmd/pack
cmd/prof
cmd/cc
cmd/gc
cmd/5l
cmd/5a
cmd/5c
cmd/5g
pkg/runtime
/scratch/go/src/pkg/runtime/malloc.goc:63[/scratch/go/src/pkg/runtime/zmalloc_linux_arm.c:53]
too many function arguments: runtime.MHeap_Alloc
go tool dist: FAILED: /scratch/go/pkg/tool/linux_arm/5c -FVw -I $WORK -DGOOS_linux
-DGOARCH_arm -o $WORK/zmalloc_linux_arm.o /scratch/go/src/pkg/runtime/zmalloc_linux_arm.c
